metadata.synopsis: Follow-up one-liner in the Gather Your Allies room in Endgame with one of the Unholy Assassins if we are Dark Urge. This one is a backup if Sarevok died.

0.speaker: Unholy Assassin Mitchia
0.text: Bodies upon bodies filled with unspilt blood. Lead us into slaughter, Chosen one. We shall do unholy service in your Father's name.

1.speaker: Unholy Assassin Mitchia
1.text: Such opportunity, such butchery awaits us - it is a blessed day for Bhaal and all his loyal slaughterers.
